basics.name: Foxy Developer
basics.title: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I create responsive, user-friendly applications with clean code and innovative solutions.

description.ar:
أنا مطور ويب شامل شغوف، لدي خبرة واسعة في أحدث تقنيات الويب. أمتلك أساسًا قويًا في تطوير الواجهة الأمامية والخلفية، وأقوم بإنشاء تطبيقات تفاعلية وسهلة الاستخدام بكود نظيف وحلول مبتكرة.
بدأت رحلتي في مجال تطوير البرمجيات خلال دراستي في جامعة مصر، حيث حصلت على درجة الماجستير في علوم الحاسوب. منذ ذلك الحين، عملت على استخدام تقنيات وأطر عمل متنوعة لبناء تطبيقات ويب قابلة للتوسع وفعالة.
أؤمن بأهمية التعلم المستمر ومواكبة أحدث اتجاهات الصناعة. هدفي هو إنشاء تجارب رقمية ذات معنى تُسهم في حل مشكلات واقعية وتضيف قيمة حقيقية للمستخدمين.
عندما لا أكون مشغولًا في البرمجة، تجدني أساهم في مشاريع مفتوحة المصدر، أو أستكشف تقنيات جديدة، أو أمارس أنشطة خارجية مثل التسلق والمشي في الطبيعة.
description.en:
I'm a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend development, I create responsive, user-friendly applications with clean code and innovative solutions.
My journey in software development began during my studies at Egypt University, where I earned my Master's degree in Computer Science. Since then, I've worked with various technologies and frameworks to build scalable and efficient web applications.
I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest industry trends. My goal is to create meaningful digital experiences that solve real-world problems and provide value to users.
When I'm not coding, you can find me contributing to open-source projects, exploring new technologies, or enjoying outdoor activities like hiking and rock climbing.

projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with product management, cart functionality, payment processing, and order tracking.

projects.name: 5Minvestment
projects.description: This is a company profile for 5min Investment — a collaborative task management and communication platform tailored for long-term investment planning.

projects.name: Mr Foxy
projects.description: Mr Foxy is a modern and responsive developer portfolio built with cutting-edge technologies including Vite and Node.js. It showcases my skills, projects, and experience in a visually appealing manner.

projects.name: Real Estate Marketplace
projects.description: A platform connecting property buyers, sellers, and agents with property listings, virtual tours, and mortgage calculators.

work.summary: Lead developer for multiple high-traffic web applications, managing a team of 5 developers.
highlights: Redesigned the company's flagship product, increasing user engagement by 40%
Implemented CI/CD pipeline, reducing deployment time by 60%
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews

work.summary: Developed and maintained web applications for clients across various industries.
highlights: Built responsive web applications using React and Node.js
Optimized database queries, improving application performance by 30%
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to implement user-friendly interfaces

work.summary: Assisted in the development of the company's web platform.
highlights: Developed responsive UI components using React
Participated in daily stand-ups and sprint planning
Contributed to the company's component library
